sentence.Network_en: Nearly eleven-thousand people have been arrested for defying the ban on street trading.
sentence.Network_cn: 将近有1.1万人因为违抗禁止在街上摆摊交易的禁令而被捕。

sentence.Network_en: I hate to see young people hanging around on street corners.
sentence.Network_cn: 我真不喜欢看到年轻人在马路上闲逛.

sentence.Network_en: A girl wearing a red dress standing on street corner.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个穿红色衣服的女孩站在街边的拐角处.

list.abs: I was one of those people who used to stand on street corners and ask for people to sign petition which at that time were directed towards the Japanese and the Soviets .我是那个时候常常站在街角征集人们在请愿书上签名的人之一，当时的请愿书是针对日本人和苏联人而写的。
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... passageway,alleyway 过道,出入口 one-way street 单行线 intersection 交叉.
翻译中的一些常用词汇等 ... 不准停车 restricted stop 57. 临街停车 parking on-street 59. 街外停车 parking off-street 60.
100个常见的公共标志和说明 ... 说明 Introductions 单行道 One Street 靠左/右 Keep Right/Left.
The police diverted traffic from one street to another ., 警察让车辆从一条街转向另一条.

sentences.sentence: "on-street parking is prohibited at rush hour"
